data.message: Eminem Im a dancer and a singer and songwriter. Forgetting lyrics to an awesome song happens alot.But guess what sometimes our biggest falls can be our greats leaps.And I think you made that song soooo incredable. I love you music and if I ever got the chance to meet you I would hug you. Your music has got me out of alot of dark places.you inspire me to keep going even when life is hard.
